lines.text: Well, let's see how papier-mache, rubber swords, and armor can bear against REAL Heavy Metal!

[after the World Maggot leaves Earth without Gwar]
Nooooooooooooo!
Well, maybe there are... TWO World Maggots.
[takes a picture of the World Maggots trail]

[Holding a disembodied head]
You Men have such lousy heads.
Hey Oderus, some guy just called, he said he's gonna kill his whole fam "damn" ily.

[shouts spontaniously]
Go for it!
[4 more numbers add to the total of harvested souls]

[hosting the Telethon]
Welcome, to the World wide Maggothon, the show where you die die die! We got Balsac, and the lovely Flattis on the Telephone Set.
[a suicidal Victim struggles to reach for the Phone as his slashed wrist bleeds away]
...so keep those donations coming, people. Now, let's go to Beefcake in the basement.
Beefcake the Mighty here, y'know, one of the greatest things about being dead, is becoming a part of the food-chain.
[two slaves sacrifice a contributing victim to the World Maggot]
Don't waste your nutritional potential, call this number today and sacrifice your Corpse to Gwar.
[Another victim is sacrificed]
With the Maggot stuffed... of your souls, it shall awaken, and using it's convenient like Saddles, while riding it...
[tone enhances]
we shall escape the ole miserable Planet!

[Watching the others lusting for Flopsy, the cunt faced Midget]
You guys are SICK!
[pauses]
Although I do like to watch.
You could uhhh... stay here with ME... baby.

[trying to help Flopsy undue the Thong on his Face]
Well hello there, let me help you undue that... ooh hoo hoo don't be shy, just think of me as Fatty Arbuckle.
[Sleazy tells the Story of how he found GWAR in Antarctica]
[after the GWAR Members are all thawed out]
Hey, where you think you at, huh?
Hey hey, cool it guys, I was just looking for... a Pay Phone!

[snarling]
Yeah...

[Sleazy draws out his Shot gun, and Slymenstra snags it with her whip]
Wooo, nothin Personal.
Yeah, you'd do the same I assure...
But wait, what of our Masters Prophecy
[Light Shines on him]
For whom ever shall awaken GWAR is...
[music starts fading]
is... is A O.K.

[sniffing a bag of coke that Sleazy dropped]
Sexcellent Point, Balsac!

[pulls out more bags of coke]
Blow, Blow? Yeah, sure you do, here, how bout you? Sleazy, Sleazy's the Name!
What do we do?

[sniffing coke]
We align...
[sniff sniff]
... with Sleazy!
Mr.Martini, I must congratulate You on creating such an... innovated concept.
Yes, Barbarians from Outer Space playing Heavy Metal, joining yer Comic with Nerds and Metal Heads together on one Product Banner, yer Demographics were right on Target!
Hey, Asshole, Demo whatevers had nothin' to do with it, GWAR, is for real, Man!
Come come now Mr.Martini, weer not yer pimply faced Teenage Fans.
...and this ain't yer typical poser Band whipped up by a bunch of D&D playing Art School Flunkies! I... had to go to the ends of the Earth to find GWAR...
[smothers Cigarette on top of the Executives Hand]
